full_summary:
### Official Government Tender Announcement - Cancellation
#### Reference Number: cb-8879-43942899
#### Solicitation Number: 2023-ADMHRCIV-0037

The Department of National Defense (DND) announces the cancellation of its solicitation, Tender Notice Reference Number cb-8879-43942899, Warfare Services Support Branch (WSSB) (ADM(HRCIV)), for the provision of Classification Services.

**Background and Objectives**
The purpose of this contract was to secure the services of classification specialists to deliver organizational design assessments, classify job descriptions, and ensure compliance with Treasury Board (TBS) classification policies. The contractors were required to have significant experience in delivering classification and organization design services for the Federal Public Service, as well as classification accreditation by TBS.

**Contract Details**
- **Contract Type**: Competition
- **Contract Duration**: Initial 2 years, plus 1 option year (3 years)
- **Estimated Budget**: $400,000 over 3 years
- **Location**: Offsite, with access to DND facilities as required

**Cancellation Details**
This tender has been cancelled due to internal reasons, and the DND will no longer be accepting bids. Contractors who had already submitted their bids will be notified separately.

**Attachment**
All relevant documents, including the Statement of Work and the Evaluation Criteria, can be found on the Canada.Buying Tenders website.

### Points of Contact

Contact information, including the name and email of Trina Gaumond, can be found at the end of this document.
